tasks.title: Setup Project Repository
tasks.description: Initialize the project repository for S1BMW using Git and set up the initial directory structure for the Next.js application with a complete technical stack.
tasks.details: Create a new Git repository and initialize a Next.js 15 project with App Router using 'npx create-next-app s1bmw-app'. Set up TypeScript, Supabase for backend services, and integrate all necessary libraries and tools as specified in the PRD.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify that the repository is created, the Next.js application runs without errors, and all integrated services and libraries are functioning correctly.

subtasks.title: Initialize Git Repository
subtasks.description: Create a new Git repository for the S1BMW project.
subtasks.details: Navigate to the desired project directory and run 'git init' to initialize a new Git repository. Create a .gitignore file to exclude node_modules and other unnecessary files.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify that the repository is initialized by checking the .git directory and ensuring the .gitignore file is present.

subtasks.title: Create Next.js Application
subtasks.description: Set up the initial Next.js application structure with the complete technical stack.
subtasks.details:
Run the command 'npx create-next-app s1bmw-app' in the terminal to create a new Next.js 15 application with App Router. Install TypeScript and configure it. Integrate Supabase for backend services, including Auth, Database, Storage, and Realtime. Add all Radix UI components, React Hook Form with Zod validation, Tailwind CSS with class-variance-authority, OpenRouter API integration, Resend for emails, @react-pdf/renderer for PDF generation, Posthog analytics, Recharts for data visualization, Zustand for state management, and Playwright for testing.

subtasks.title: Set Up ESLint and Prettier
subtasks.description: Configure ESLint and Prettier for code quality and formatting.
subtasks.details: Install ESLint and Prettier by running 'npm install --save-dev eslint prettier eslint-config-prettier eslint-plugin-prettier'. Create configuration files for both tools and integrate them into the Next.js project.
subtasks.testStrategy: Run ESLint and Prettier commands to ensure there are no linting errors and that the code is formatted correctly.

subtasks.title: Commit Initial Setup
subtasks.description: Commit the initial project setup to the Git repository.
subtasks.details: Stage all changes using 'git add .' and commit with a message 'Initial project setup with Next.js and TypeScript'.

subtasks.title: Configure Tailwind CSS
subtasks.description: Set up Tailwind CSS for styling the Next.js application.
subtasks.details: Follow the Tailwind CSS installation guide to configure Tailwind in the Next.js project, including setting up the tailwind.config.js and postcss.config.js files.

subtasks.title: Create project structure
subtasks.description: Set up the proper directory structure for the Next.js app
subtasks.details:
Create the following directories:
- app/ (App Router pages and layouts)
- components/ (Reusable React components)
- lib/ (Utility functions and configurations)
- hooks/ (Custom React hooks)
- types/ (TypeScript type definitions)
- styles/ (Global styles)
- public/ (Static assets)

tasks.title: Configure Supabase Database
tasks.description: Set up the Supabase project and configure the PostgreSQL database according to the provided schema.
tasks.details: Create a new Supabase project, configure the database, and implement the provided SQL schema for user roles, businesses, projects, modules, questions, and other necessary tables.
tasks.testStrategy: Run SQL queries to ensure tables are created and accessible.

subtasks.title: Create Supabase Project
subtasks.description: Set up a new Supabase project in the Supabase dashboard.
subtasks.details: Log in to the Supabase dashboard, click on 'New Project', fill in the project name and password, and select the region. Once created, note down the API keys and database URL for future use.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify that the project is created and accessible in the Supabase dashboard.

subtasks.title: Configure PostgreSQL Database
subtasks.description: Set up the PostgreSQL database settings and connection parameters in Supabase.
subtasks.details: Navigate to the 'Database' section in your Supabase project. Configure the database settings such as connection pooling and enable any necessary extensions. Ensure that the database is ready for schema implementation.
subtasks.testStrategy: Check the database settings and ensure they are correctly configured.

subtasks.title: Implement SQL Schema
subtasks.description: Execute the provided SQL schema to create necessary tables in the database.
subtasks.details: Use the SQL editor in Supabase to run the provided SQL scripts that define the tables for user roles, businesses, projects, modules, and questions. Ensure that all tables are created without errors.
subtasks.testStrategy: Run SQL queries to confirm that all tables exist and have the correct structure.

subtasks.title: Set Up Database Policies
subtasks.description: Define Row Level Security (RLS) policies for the created tables to manage access control.
subtasks.details: In the Supabase dashboard, navigate to each table and enable Row Level Security. Create policies that define who can read, insert, update, and delete records based on user roles.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test the policies by attempting to access the tables with different user roles to ensure they enforce the correct permissions.

subtasks.title: Verify Database Configuration
subtasks.description: Conduct a thorough check of the database configuration and schema implementation.
subtasks.details: Review the database setup, including tables, relationships, and policies. Run test queries to ensure that the schema works as intended and that the data can be accessed according to the defined policies.
subtasks.testStrategy: Perform a series of test queries to validate that the database responds correctly and that all configurations are functioning as expected.

tasks.title: Implement User Authentication
tasks.description: Integrate Supabase Auth for user registration and login functionalities.
tasks.details: Use Supabase Auth to implement user signup, email verification, and login functionalities. Ensure JWT tokens are used for session management.
tasks.testStrategy: Test user registration, email verification, and login processes to ensure they function correctly.

subtasks.title: Set Up Supabase Project
subtasks.description: Create a new Supabase project and configure the authentication settings.
subtasks.details: Go to the Supabase website, create a new project, and navigate to the authentication settings. Enable email/password authentication and configure any necessary settings such as email templates for verification.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify that the Supabase project is created and authentication settings are correctly configured.

subtasks.title: Implement User Signup Functionality
subtasks.description: Develop the user registration feature using Supabase Auth.
subtasks.details: Create a signup form in the application that collects user information (email and password). Use the Supabase client library to call the signup method and handle responses for success and error cases.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test the signup process by registering new users and ensuring they receive a confirmation email.

subtasks.title: Implement Email Verification
subtasks.description: Set up email verification for new users after registration.
subtasks.details: Configure Supabase to send verification emails upon user signup. Implement a verification link that users can click to confirm their email address, and handle the verification status in the application.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test the email verification process by registering a user and ensuring they can verify their email through the link.

subtasks.title: Implement User Login Functionality
subtasks.description: Create the login feature for users to access their accounts.
subtasks.details: Develop a login form that accepts user credentials (email and password). Use the Supabase client library to authenticate users and manage JWT tokens for session management.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test the login process by logging in with valid and invalid credentials to ensure proper authentication.

subtasks.title: Manage JWT Tokens and Session State
subtasks.description: Implement session management using JWT tokens for authenticated users.
subtasks.details: Ensure that JWT tokens are stored securely in the application (e.g., local storage or cookies). Implement logic to check token validity and manage user session state throughout the application.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test session management by logging in, checking token storage, and verifying session persistence across page reloads.

tasks.title: Create User Roles and Permissions
tasks.description: Define user roles and implement role-based access control for the application.
tasks.details: Implement role-based access control using the user_roles table to manage permissions for different user types (Super Admin, Business Owner, etc.).
tasks.testStrategy: Verify that users have appropriate access based on their roles.

subtasks.title: Define User Roles
subtasks.description: Create a comprehensive list of user roles required for the application, including Super Admin, Business Owner, and any other relevant roles.
subtasks.details: Gather requirements from stakeholders to identify all necessary user roles. Document the roles and their intended purposes in a shared document for team reference.
subtasks.testStrategy: Review the list with stakeholders to ensure all roles are captured accurately.

subtasks.title: Design User Roles Table Schema
subtasks.description: Design the database schema for the user_roles table to store user role information.
subtasks.details: Create a SQL schema for the user_roles table that includes fields such as id, role_name, and description. Ensure the schema aligns with the defined user roles.
subtasks.testStrategy: Run SQL queries to create the table and verify its structure matches the design.

subtasks.title: Implement Role-Based Access Control Logic
subtasks.description: Develop the backend logic to enforce role-based access control based on the user_roles table.
subtasks.details: Implement middleware or service functions that check user roles against the required permissions for various application routes and features. Ensure that access is granted or denied based on the user's role.
subtasks.testStrategy: Create unit tests to verify that access control works as expected for different user roles.

subtasks.title: Create User Interface for Role Management
subtasks.description: Develop a user interface that allows administrators to manage user roles and permissions.
subtasks.details: Build a frontend component that displays the list of user roles and allows for adding, editing, and deleting roles. Ensure that changes are reflected in the user_roles table.
subtasks.testStrategy: Conduct user acceptance testing with administrators to ensure the interface is intuitive and functional.

subtasks.title: Test Role-Based Access Control
subtasks.description: Conduct thorough testing of the role-based access control implementation to ensure it functions correctly across the application.
subtasks.details: Create test cases that cover all user roles and their permissions. Simulate user actions to verify that access is granted or denied appropriately based on roles.
subtasks.testStrategy: Perform integration testing to ensure that the role-based access control works seamlessly with the entire application.

tasks.title: Develop Onboarding Wizard
tasks.description: Create a multi-step onboarding wizard for new users to set up their business and project.
tasks.details: Implement a multi-step form that guides users through creating their business and first project. Use Supabase to store the data.
tasks.testStrategy: Ensure that the onboarding process successfully creates a business and project in the database.

subtasks.title: Design Onboarding Wizard UI
subtasks.description: Create wireframes and mockups for the multi-step onboarding wizard, ensuring a user-friendly interface.
subtasks.details: Use design tools like Figma or Sketch to create wireframes for each step of the onboarding process. Focus on clarity and ease of navigation.
subtasks.testStrategy: Conduct user testing on the mockups to gather feedback on usability.

subtasks.title: Implement Frontend Form Logic
subtasks.description: Develop the frontend logic for the multi-step form using React or another frontend framework.
subtasks.details: Create a React component that manages the state of the form, including navigation between steps and validation of user inputs.
subtasks.testStrategy: Unit test each form step to ensure correct data handling and navigation.

subtasks.title: Set Up Supabase Database Structure
subtasks.description: Design and implement the database schema in Supabase to store business and project data.
subtasks.details: Define tables for 'Businesses' and 'Projects' in Supabase, including necessary fields such as name, description, and user ID. Use Supabase's dashboard for setup.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify the database structure by inserting sample data and checking for integrity.

subtasks.title: Connect Frontend to Supabase
subtasks.description: Integrate the frontend form with Supabase to save user inputs during the onboarding process.
subtasks.details: Use Supabase client libraries to connect the form submission to the database, ensuring data is saved correctly for each step of the onboarding.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test the entire onboarding flow to ensure data is correctly saved in the database after each step.

subtasks.title: Implement Completion and Feedback Mechanism
subtasks.description: Add a completion step that confirms successful onboarding and gathers user feedback.
subtasks.details: Create a final step in the onboarding wizard that displays a success message and prompts users for feedback on their experience.
subtasks.testStrategy: Check that the completion step is reached after successful data submission and that feedback is recorded properly.

tasks.title: Implement M1 Foundation Questions Workshop
tasks.description: Develop the M1 module with 57 foundational questions using the six-part framework.
tasks.details: Create the M1 module with all 57 questions, ensuring each question follows the six-part framework (definition, examples, demonstrations, etc.).
tasks.testStrategy: Test that all questions are accessible and correctly formatted in the UI.

subtasks.title: Define the Six-Part Framework
subtasks.description: Outline the six-part framework that will be used for each of the 57 foundational questions. This includes defining what each part entails: definition, examples, demonstrations, etc.
subtasks.details: Create a document that clearly describes each of the six parts of the framework, providing examples for clarity. Ensure that this document is accessible to all team members involved in the question development.
subtasks.testStrategy: Review the framework document with the team to ensure understanding and agreement.

subtasks.title: Draft 57 Foundational Questions
subtasks.description: Create a draft of all 57 foundational questions based on the defined six-part framework. Each question should be structured to include all six components.
subtasks.details: Using the framework document, draft each question ensuring it adheres to the structure. Collaborate with subject matter experts if necessary to ensure the questions are relevant and comprehensive.
subtasks.testStrategy: Conduct a peer review of the drafted questions to ensure they meet the framework requirements.

subtasks.title: Create UI Mockups for Questions
subtasks.description: Design user interface mockups that will display the 57 foundational questions in a user-friendly manner, incorporating the six-part framework for each question.
subtasks.details: Utilize design tools to create mockups that visually represent how each question will be presented to users. Ensure that the design is intuitive and aligns with the overall application aesthetics.
subtasks.testStrategy: Gather feedback from potential users on the mockups to assess usability and clarity.

subtasks.title: Implement the Questions in the Application
subtasks.description: Develop the backend and frontend components to implement the 57 foundational questions into the application, ensuring they follow the six-part framework.
subtasks.details: Code the necessary components to display the questions in the application. Ensure that each question is interactive and that all parts of the framework are represented correctly in the UI.
subtasks.testStrategy: Perform unit testing on each question component to ensure functionality and correct formatting.

subtasks.title: Conduct Final Review and Testing
subtasks.description: Perform a comprehensive review and testing of the M1 module to ensure all 57 questions are accessible and correctly formatted in the UI.
subtasks.details: Review the entire module for consistency and accuracy. Conduct user testing to ensure that all questions are functioning as intended and that users can navigate through them seamlessly.
subtasks.testStrategy: Execute user acceptance testing (UAT) to validate that the module meets user needs and expectations.

tasks.title: Build Two-Panel Workshop Interface
tasks.description: Create a two-panel interface for users to answer questions and receive AI assistance.
tasks.details: Develop a UI with a left panel for user answers and a right panel for AI suggestions, ensuring real-time updates between panels.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify that user inputs and AI suggestions update correctly in real-time.

subtasks.title: Design UI Layout for Two Panels
subtasks.description: Create a wireframe or mockup for the two-panel interface, ensuring that the left panel is designated for user answers and the right panel for AI suggestions.
subtasks.details: Use a design tool like Figma or Adobe XD to create the layout. Ensure that the panels are responsive and visually distinct. Include placeholders for user input and AI output.
subtasks.testStrategy: Review the design with stakeholders to ensure it meets requirements.

subtasks.title: Implement Left Panel for User Input
subtasks.description: Develop the left panel of the interface where users can input their answers. This panel should include a text area and a submit button.
subtasks.details: Use React components to create the left panel. Implement a controlled input for the text area and a button that triggers an event to capture user input.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test the input functionality to ensure user inputs are captured correctly.

subtasks.title: Implement Right Panel for AI Suggestions
subtasks.description: Develop the right panel of the interface that displays AI suggestions based on user input.
subtasks.details: Create a React component for the right panel that listens for updates from the left panel. Use state management to display AI suggestions dynamically.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify that AI suggestions update in real-time as user input changes.

subtasks.title: Establish Real-Time Communication Between Panels
subtasks.description: Implement the logic to ensure real-time updates between the left and right panels, allowing for seamless interaction.
subtasks.details: Utilize WebSockets or a similar technology to enable real-time communication. Ensure that when the user submits an answer, the right panel updates with relevant AI suggestions.
subtasks.testStrategy: Conduct tests to ensure that updates are reflected in both panels without delay.

subtasks.title: Conduct User Testing and Feedback Session
subtasks.description: Organize a user testing session to gather feedback on the two-panel interface and make necessary adjustments based on user experience.
subtasks.details: Invite a group of users to interact with the interface and provide feedback. Document their experiences and identify areas for improvement.
subtasks.testStrategy: Analyze user feedback and implement changes to enhance usability and functionality.

tasks.title: Integrate OpenRouter API
tasks.description: Set up the OpenRouter API for AI assistance in answering questions.
tasks.details: Implement the OpenRouter API client to provide AI suggestions based on user inputs and previous answers.
tasks.testStrategy: Test AI suggestions for various questions to ensure they are contextually relevant.

subtasks.title: Set Up OpenRouter API Client
subtasks.description: Create a client for the OpenRouter API that will handle requests and responses for AI suggestions.
subtasks.details: Implement the OpenRouter API client using the appropriate programming language and libraries. Ensure that the client can send requests to the API and handle responses correctly.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test the client by sending sample requests and verifying the responses against expected results.

subtasks.title: Implement User Input Handling
subtasks.description: Develop functionality to capture user inputs and prepare them for sending to the OpenRouter API.
subtasks.details: Create a user interface component that allows users to input their questions. Implement logic to validate and format these inputs before sending them to the OpenRouter API client.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test the input handling by ensuring that various types of user inputs are correctly captured and formatted.

subtasks.title: Integrate API Response Processing
subtasks.description: Process the responses received from the OpenRouter API and display the AI suggestions to the user.
subtasks.details: Implement a function that takes the API response and extracts relevant AI suggestions. Display these suggestions in the user interface in a user-friendly manner.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test the response processing by verifying that the suggestions displayed match the expected output from the API.

subtasks.title: Implement Contextual Awareness
subtasks.description: Enhance the API client to consider previous user inputs and responses for generating more relevant AI suggestions.
subtasks.details: Modify the API request to include context from previous interactions. Ensure that the OpenRouter API can utilize this context to improve the relevance of its suggestions.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test the contextual awareness by comparing AI suggestions with and without previous context to ensure improved relevance.

subtasks.title: Conduct Comprehensive Testing
subtasks.description: Perform thorough testing of the entire integration to ensure that the OpenRouter API functions as expected.
subtasks.details: Create a suite of test cases that cover various scenarios, including different types of questions and edge cases. Validate that the integration provides accurate and contextually relevant suggestions.
subtasks.testStrategy: Execute the test cases and document the results, ensuring that all functionalities work correctly and meet the requirements.

tasks.title: Implement Real-Time Collaboration Features
tasks.description: Enable real-time collaboration for multiple users working on the same project.
tasks.details: Use Supabase Realtime to implement live updates for user answers and AI suggestions, allowing multiple users to collaborate simultaneously.
tasks.testStrategy: Test real-time updates by having multiple users edit answers and observe changes.

subtasks.title: Set Up Supabase Realtime
subtasks.description: Configure Supabase Realtime in the project to enable live updates for collaborative features.
subtasks.details: Follow the Supabase documentation to set up Realtime in your project. Ensure that the necessary database tables are configured to support real-time subscriptions.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify that the Realtime service is correctly set up by testing connections and subscriptions.

subtasks.title: Implement User Presence Tracking
subtasks.description: Develop functionality to track user presence in real-time, allowing users to see who is currently collaborating on the project.
subtasks.details: Utilize Supabase's presence feature to track users' online status. Implement logic to update the UI with the list of active users in the collaboration session.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test presence tracking by having multiple users log in and observe the updates in the user list.

subtasks.title: Enable Live Updates for User Answers
subtasks.description: Implement real-time updates for user answers, ensuring that changes made by one user are reflected for all collaborators instantly.
subtasks.details: Create a subscription to the relevant database table that stores user answers. When a user updates their answer, broadcast this change to all connected clients.
subtasks.testStrategy: Conduct tests with multiple users editing answers simultaneously to ensure updates are reflected in real-time.

subtasks.title: Implement AI Suggestions in Real-Time
subtasks.description: Integrate AI suggestions that update in real-time as users collaborate, enhancing the collaborative experience.
subtasks.details: Set up a system to generate AI suggestions based on user inputs and subscribe to the relevant data changes. Ensure that suggestions are updated and displayed in real-time.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test the AI suggestion feature by having users input data and observing the real-time updates of suggestions.

subtasks.title: Test and Optimize Real-Time Collaboration Features
subtasks.description: Conduct comprehensive testing of all real-time collaboration features and optimize performance based on feedback.
subtasks.details: Gather a group of users to test the collaboration features extensively. Monitor performance, identify any lag or issues, and optimize the implementation as needed.
subtasks.testStrategy: Evaluate the overall user experience during collaborative sessions and make adjustments based on user feedback.

tasks.title: Create Brand Portal Generation Functionality
tasks.description: Develop the functionality to generate a brand portal from user responses.
tasks.details: Implement the logic to compile user responses into a professional brand guide, including real-time updates as questions are answered.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify that the brand portal updates correctly and reflects user inputs.

subtasks.title: Design User Response Schema
subtasks.description: Create a schema to store user responses for the brand portal, ensuring it captures all necessary data points.
subtasks.details: Define a database schema that includes fields for each question and response type. Use Supabase to create the necessary tables and relationships.
subtasks.testStrategy: Run SQL queries to ensure the schema is created correctly and can store sample data.

subtasks.title: Implement Real-Time Response Handling
subtasks.description: Develop the functionality to handle user responses in real-time as they answer questions.
subtasks.details: Utilize WebSockets or a similar technology to capture user inputs and update the brand guide dynamically. Ensure that the UI reflects changes immediately.

subtasks.title: Compile Brand Guide Logic

subtasks.details: Implement a function that takes the stored user responses and formats them into a professional brand guide. Use a templating engine if necessary.

subtasks.title: Integrate Advanced Question Types
subtasks.description: Incorporate advanced question types into the brand portal to enhance user engagement and response quality.
subtasks.details: Implement interactive question formats such as sliders and card sorting. Ensure these formats are integrated into the existing response handling logic.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test each advanced question type to ensure they function correctly and gather the intended insights.

subtasks.title: User Interface for Brand Portal
subtasks.description: Develop the user interface for the brand portal, allowing users to interact with questions and view their brand guide.
subtasks.details: Create a responsive UI using Next.js that allows users to navigate through questions and see real-time updates to their brand guide. Ensure accessibility and usability best practices are followed.

tasks.title: Implement PDF and Markdown Export Functionality

subtasks.title: Implement Markdown Export Functionality
subtasks.description: Develop the functionality to export content from the brand portal to Markdown format.

subtasks.title: Integrate Export Options in UI

subtasks.title: Conduct Comprehensive Testing of Export Functionality

subtasks.details: Create test cases that cover various content types and lengths for both export formats. Verify that the exported files are generated correctly and contain the expected content.
subtasks.testStrategy: Run automated tests and manual tests to validate the export functionalities under different scenarios.

tasks.details: Implement AI suggestions for each question type, ensuring context awareness and multiple suggestion options.

subtasks.testStrategy: Conduct user testing to gather feedback on the usability and effectiveness of the suggestions.

subtasks.title: Implement Context Awareness Features
subtasks.description: Enhance the AI suggestions to be context-aware by incorporating user history and preferences.
subtasks.details: Develop logic to analyze user history and preferences to tailor suggestions more effectively. This may involve storing user data and creating algorithms to interpret it.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test the context awareness by simulating different user profiles and checking the relevance of suggestions.

subtasks.title: Conduct Comprehensive Testing and Refinement
subtasks.description: Perform extensive testing of the entire AI-powered question assistance feature to ensure functionality and user satisfaction.
subtasks.details: Create test cases that cover various scenarios, including different question types and user inputs. Gather user feedback and refine the AI suggestions based on testing results.
subtasks.testStrategy: Use A/B testing with real users to compare the effectiveness of AI suggestions against a control group without suggestions.

tasks.title: Implement Module Dependencies and Progression Logic
tasks.description: Create logic to manage module dependencies and user progression through the strategy path.
tasks.details: Develop algorithms to unlock modules based on prerequisite completion and visualize user progress across modules.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify that modules unlock correctly based on user progress.

subtasks.title: Define Module Structure and Dependencies
subtasks.description: Create a data structure to represent modules and their dependencies. This should include attributes for each module such as ID, title, description, and a list of prerequisite module IDs.
subtasks.details: Use a JSON format to define the module structure. Each module should have a unique ID and a list of prerequisite IDs that must be completed before unlocking the module.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify the structure by checking if all modules are correctly defined with their dependencies.

subtasks.title: Implement Module Unlock Logic
subtasks.description: Develop the algorithm that checks if a user has completed the prerequisite modules and unlocks the next module accordingly.
subtasks.details: Create a function that takes a users completed modules as input and compares it against the defined module dependencies. If all prerequisites are met, the module should be marked as unlocked.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test the unlocking logic with various scenarios of completed modules to ensure correct modules are unlocked.

subtasks.title: Track User Progress Across Modules
subtasks.description: Implement a system to track user progress through the modules, storing which modules have been completed and which are currently unlocked.
subtasks.details: Use a database or local storage to save user progress. Create functions to update the progress when a module is completed and retrieve the current status of unlocked modules.
subtasks.testStrategy: Simulate user progress and verify that the stored data reflects the correct state of module completion.

subtasks.title: Visualize User Progress
subtasks.description: Create a user interface component that visually represents the user's progress through the modules, highlighting completed and unlocked modules.
subtasks.details: Design a UI component that displays modules in a flowchart or list format. Use colors or icons to indicate completed, unlocked, and locked modules.
subtasks.testStrategy: Conduct user testing to ensure the visualization is clear and accurately reflects user progress.

subtasks.title: Integrate Progression Logic with User Authentication
subtasks.description: Ensure that the module progression logic is integrated with the user authentication system, allowing progress to be saved and retrieved based on user sessions.
subtasks.details: Link the module progression data to the user authentication system so that each user's progress is tied to their account. Ensure that progress is loaded upon user login.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test the integration by logging in with different user accounts and verifying that each account shows the correct module progress.

tasks.title: Create Advanced Question Types
tasks.description: Develop interactive question formats beyond text input for richer insights.
tasks.details: Implement advanced question types such as sliders, card sorting, and scenario branching to enhance user engagement.
tasks.testStrategy: Test advanced question types to ensure they function correctly and gather the intended insights.

subtasks.title: Design Slider Question Type
subtasks.description: Create the design and user interface for the slider question type, allowing users to select a value within a defined range.
subtasks.details: Implement a React component that renders a slider input. Use a library like 'rc-slider' for better UI. Ensure it accepts props for min, max, and step values.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test the slider to ensure it allows selection within the defined range and updates the state correctly.

subtasks.title: Implement Slider Logic
subtasks.description: Develop the logic to handle user input from the slider question type and store the selected value.
subtasks.details: Create a state management solution (using React's useState or a context provider) to capture the slider's value. Ensure the value is saved to the appropriate data structure for submission.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify that the selected value is stored correctly and can be retrieved for submission.

subtasks.title: Design Card Sorting Question Type
subtasks.description: Create the design and user interface for the card sorting question type, allowing users to categorize items.
subtasks.details: Implement a React component that displays cards representing items. Users should be able to drag and drop cards into categories. Use a library like 'react-beautiful-dnd' for drag-and-drop functionality.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test the drag-and-drop functionality to ensure items can be sorted correctly and categories are recognized.

subtasks.title: Implement Card Sorting Logic
subtasks.description: Develop the logic to handle user input from the card sorting question type and store the categorized items.
subtasks.details: Create a state management solution to capture the sorted categories and items. Ensure the categorized data is saved for submission.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify that the categorized data is stored correctly and can be retrieved for submission.

subtasks.title: Develop Scenario Branching Logic
subtasks.description: Implement the logic for scenario branching, allowing users to navigate through different questions based on their previous answers.
subtasks.details: Create a state management solution to track user responses and determine the next question based on predefined branching logic. Use conditional rendering to display the appropriate questions.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test the branching logic to ensure users are directed to the correct questions based on their answers.

tasks.title: Automate Competitor and Website Analysis
tasks.description: Integrate n8n workflows to automate competitor and website analysis for strategic recommendations.
tasks.details: Set up n8n workflows to trigger automated analysis based on user input URLs and provide comprehensive reports.
tasks.testStrategy: Test the analysis workflows to ensure they generate accurate and useful reports.

subtasks.title: Set Up n8n Environment
subtasks.description: Establish the n8n environment to create workflows for competitor and website analysis.
subtasks.details: Install n8n on your local machine or server. Ensure that you have access to the necessary APIs for competitor analysis and website data retrieval. Configure the n8n instance to allow for external API calls.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify that n8n is running correctly and can connect to external APIs.

subtasks.title: Create Input Trigger for User URLs
subtasks.description: Develop a trigger in n8n that captures user input URLs for analysis.
subtasks.details: Use the HTTP Request node in n8n to create a webhook that accepts user input URLs. Ensure that the input is validated and can be processed for analysis.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test the webhook by sending sample URLs and confirming that they are received correctly.

subtasks.title: Integrate Competitor Analysis API
subtasks.description: Connect to the competitor analysis API to fetch data based on user input URLs.
subtasks.details: Utilize the HTTP Request node to call the competitor analysis API with the user-provided URLs. Parse the response to extract relevant data for reporting.
subtasks.testStrategy: Run tests with various URLs to ensure the API integration returns accurate and expected data.

subtasks.title: Generate Comprehensive Reports
subtasks.description: Create a report generation workflow that compiles analysis data into a structured format.
subtasks.details: Use n8n's built-in functions to format the data received from the competitor analysis API into a comprehensive report. This can include charts, tables, and key insights.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test the report generation with sample data to ensure it is formatted correctly and contains all necessary information.

subtasks.title: Automate Workflow Execution
subtasks.description: Set up automation to trigger the entire workflow based on user input and schedule regular analysis.
subtasks.details: Configure n8n to automate the execution of the workflow whenever a new URL is submitted. Additionally, set up a cron job to run the analysis at regular intervals for ongoing competitor monitoring.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test the automation by submitting URLs and checking if the workflow executes as expected, including scheduled runs.

tasks.title: Develop Activation Marketplace
tasks.description: Create a marketplace for users to access tactical marketing deliverables based on their brand foundation.
tasks.details: Implement a marketplace where users can browse and create tactical marketing deliverables using their brand data.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify that users can access and create deliverables from the marketplace.

subtasks.title: Design Marketplace User Interface
subtasks.description: Create wireframes and mockups for the marketplace user interface, focusing on user experience and accessibility.
subtasks.details: Use design tools like Figma or Adobe XD to create the UI mockups. Ensure the design includes sections for browsing deliverables, user account management, and a search feature.
subtasks.testStrategy: Conduct user testing sessions to gather feedback on the usability of the design.

subtasks.title: Implement Marketplace Backend API
subtasks.description: Develop the backend API to support marketplace functionalities such as fetching deliverables and user interactions.
subtasks.details: Use Node.js with Express to create RESTful endpoints for the marketplace. Implement endpoints for listing deliverables, creating new deliverables, and user authentication.
subtasks.testStrategy: Write unit tests for each API endpoint to ensure they return the expected results.

subtasks.title: Integrate Supabase for Data Management
subtasks.description: Connect the marketplace backend to Supabase for managing user data and deliverables.
subtasks.details: Utilize Supabase client libraries to interact with the PostgreSQL database. Ensure that user authentication and data retrieval are properly handled.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test database interactions to verify that data is correctly stored and retrieved from Supabase.

subtasks.title: Develop Frontend Functionality
subtasks.description: Implement the frontend functionality to allow users to browse and create tactical marketing deliverables.
subtasks.details: Use React or Vue.js to build the frontend components. Ensure that users can view deliverables, create new ones, and manage their accounts seamlessly.
subtasks.testStrategy: Perform integration testing to ensure that the frontend interacts correctly with the backend API.

subtasks.title: Conduct User Acceptance Testing
subtasks.description: Perform user acceptance testing (UAT) to validate that the marketplace meets user needs and requirements.
subtasks.details: Gather a group of users to test the marketplace functionalities. Collect feedback and identify any issues that need to be addressed before launch.
subtasks.testStrategy: Create a feedback form for users to report their experiences and any bugs encountered during testing.

tasks.title: Implement User Feedback and Analytics Tracking
tasks.description: Set up tracking for user feedback and analytics to monitor engagement and satisfaction.
tasks.details: Integrate analytics tools to track user engagement metrics and gather feedback for continuous improvement.
tasks.testStrategy: Test analytics tracking to ensure data is collected accurately.

subtasks.title: Select and Integrate Analytics Tool
subtasks.description: Choose an appropriate analytics tool (e.g., Google Analytics, Mixpanel) and integrate it into the application.
subtasks.details: Research and select an analytics tool that fits the project's needs. Follow the tool's documentation to integrate it into the application, ensuring that the necessary SDKs or libraries are included.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify that the analytics tool is correctly integrated by checking if data is being sent to the analytics dashboard.

subtasks.title: Define User Engagement Metrics
subtasks.description: Identify and define the key user engagement metrics that need to be tracked.
subtasks.details: Collaborate with stakeholders to determine which metrics are important for tracking user engagement (e.g., session duration, page views, user actions). Document these metrics for implementation.
subtasks.testStrategy: Review the defined metrics with stakeholders to ensure they align with business goals.

subtasks.title: Implement Event Tracking for Engagement Metrics
subtasks.description: Set up event tracking in the analytics tool for the defined user engagement metrics.
subtasks.details: Using the selected analytics tool, implement event tracking for the defined metrics. This may involve adding tracking code to specific user actions (e.g., button clicks, form submissions) throughout the application.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test each event to ensure that it is being tracked correctly in the analytics dashboard.

subtasks.title: Create User Feedback Mechanism
subtasks.description: Develop a user feedback mechanism (e.g., surveys, feedback forms) to gather user insights.
subtasks.details: Design and implement a user feedback form that can be easily accessed by users. Ensure that the feedback collected is stored in a way that can be analyzed later.
subtasks.testStrategy: Conduct user testing to ensure the feedback mechanism is user-friendly and that feedback is being collected accurately.

subtasks.title: Analyze and Report on User Engagement and Feedback
subtasks.description: Analyze the collected user engagement data and feedback to generate reports for continuous improvement.
subtasks.details: Use the analytics tool to analyze the engagement metrics and feedback collected. Create reports that summarize findings and suggest areas for improvement.
subtasks.testStrategy: Present the reports to stakeholders and gather feedback to ensure the analysis meets their needs.

tasks.title: Conduct Performance Testing and Optimization
tasks.description: Perform performance testing to ensure the application meets uptime and response time requirements.
tasks.details: Conduct load testing and optimize database queries to ensure the application meets performance metrics.
tasks.testStrategy: Monitor performance metrics during testing to ensure they meet defined criteria.

subtasks.title: Define Performance Metrics
subtasks.description: Identify and document the specific performance metrics that the application needs to meet, including uptime and response time requirements.
subtasks.details: Gather input from stakeholders to define acceptable performance metrics. Document these metrics in a shared document for reference during testing.
subtasks.testStrategy: Review the documented metrics with stakeholders to ensure alignment.

subtasks.title: Set Up Load Testing Environment
subtasks.description: Prepare the environment for conducting load testing, including selecting appropriate tools and configuring the application for testing.
subtasks.details: Choose a load testing tool (e.g., JMeter, Gatling) and set it up. Ensure the application is deployed in a test environment that mirrors production settings.
subtasks.testStrategy: Run a simple test to verify that the load testing tool can successfully connect to the application.

subtasks.title: Conduct Load Testing
subtasks.description: Execute load tests based on the defined performance metrics to evaluate the application's response times and uptime under various load conditions.
subtasks.details: Use the load testing tool to simulate user traffic and monitor the application's performance. Collect data on response times and uptime during the tests.
subtasks.testStrategy: Analyze the load test results to ensure they meet the defined performance metrics.

subtasks.title: Optimize Database Queries
subtasks.description: Review and optimize database queries to improve application performance based on the findings from the load testing.
subtasks.details: Identify slow-performing queries from the load test results and optimize them by adding indexes, rewriting queries, or adjusting database configurations.
subtasks.testStrategy: Re-run the load tests after optimizations to verify improvements in response times.

subtasks.title: Document Performance Testing Results
subtasks.description: Compile and document the results of the performance testing and optimization efforts, including metrics achieved and any recommendations for future improvements.
subtasks.details: Create a report summarizing the performance metrics, load testing results, and any optimizations made. Share this report with stakeholders for review.
subtasks.testStrategy: Ensure the report is reviewed and approved by stakeholders to confirm that all performance goals have been met.

tasks.title: Implement Security Measures and Compliance
tasks.description: Ensure the application adheres to security best practices and compliance requirements.
tasks.details: Implement security measures such as JWT token management, rate limiting, and data encryption to protect user data and comply with regulations.
tasks.testStrategy: Conduct security audits to verify that all measures are in place and functioning correctly.

subtasks.title: Implement JWT Token Management
subtasks.description: Set up JWT token management for user authentication to ensure secure session handling.
subtasks.details: Integrate JWT for user authentication by generating tokens upon successful login and implementing middleware to validate tokens for protected routes.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test token generation and validation by simulating user login and accessing protected resources.

subtasks.title: Implement Rate Limiting
subtasks.description: Add rate limiting to the application to prevent abuse and ensure fair usage of resources.
subtasks.details: Use a rate limiting library to restrict the number of requests a user can make to the API within a specified time frame. Configure limits based on user roles.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test rate limiting by simulating multiple requests from a single user and verifying that the limit is enforced.

subtasks.title: Implement Data Encryption
subtasks.description: Ensure that sensitive user data is encrypted both at rest and in transit.
subtasks.details: Utilize encryption libraries to encrypt sensitive data before storing it in the database and ensure that all data transmitted over the network is secured using HTTPS.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify that data is encrypted in the database and that HTTPS is enforced for all API requests.

subtasks.title: Conduct Security Audits
subtasks.description: Perform security audits to identify vulnerabilities and ensure compliance with security best practices.
subtasks.details: Use automated security scanning tools to analyze the application for vulnerabilities and manually review code for security best practices.
subtasks.testStrategy: Document findings from the security audit and ensure that identified issues are addressed.

subtasks.title: Document Security Measures and Compliance
subtasks.description: Create comprehensive documentation outlining the implemented security measures and compliance requirements.
subtasks.details: Compile documentation that details the security measures taken, compliance standards met, and guidelines for maintaining security in the application.
subtasks.testStrategy: Review documentation for completeness and accuracy, ensuring it aligns with implemented security measures.

tasks.title: Prepare for Deployment
tasks.description: Finalize the application for deployment on Vercel, ensuring all configurations are set.
tasks.details: Prepare the application for deployment, including environment variable setup and final testing on Vercel.
tasks.testStrategy: Deploy the application and verify that it runs correctly in the production environment.

subtasks.title: Set Up Environment Variables
subtasks.description: Configure all necessary environment variables required for the application to run in the production environment on Vercel.
subtasks.details: Identify all environment variables needed for the application, such as API keys and database URLs. Use the Vercel dashboard to set these variables under the project settings.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify that the environment variables are correctly set by logging their values in a test deployment.

subtasks.title: Finalize Application Build
subtasks.description: Build the application for production, ensuring that all assets are optimized and ready for deployment.
subtasks.details: Run the build command specific to your framework (e.g., 'npm run build' for React) to generate the production-ready files. Ensure that the build process completes without errors.
subtasks.testStrategy: Check the output directory for the expected production files and ensure there are no build errors.

subtasks.title: Deploy Application to Vercel
subtasks.description: Deploy the finalized application build to Vercel, ensuring that the deployment process is successful.
subtasks.details: Use the Vercel CLI or dashboard to deploy the application. Follow the prompts to select the correct project and confirm the deployment.
subtasks.testStrategy: Access the deployed application URL to ensure it is live and functioning as expected.

subtasks.title: Conduct Final Testing
subtasks.description: Perform thorough testing on the deployed application to ensure all features work correctly in the production environment.
subtasks.details: Test all major functionalities of the application, including user authentication, data retrieval, and any critical workflows. Document any issues encountered.
subtasks.testStrategy: Create a checklist of features to test and ensure each one passes without issues.

subtasks.title: Monitor Application Performance
subtasks.description: Set up monitoring tools to track the application's performance and error rates post-deployment.
subtasks.details: Integrate monitoring tools such as Vercel Analytics or third-party services like Sentry to track performance metrics and errors. Configure alerts for critical issues.
subtasks.testStrategy: Review the monitoring dashboard after deployment to ensure it is capturing data correctly and set up alerts for any anomalies.

tasks.title: Set Up Comprehensive Testing Infrastructure with Playwright and Vitest
tasks.description: Establish a robust testing infrastructure using Playwright for end-to-end tests and Vitest for unit tests, incorporating a Test-Driven Development (TDD) workflow.
tasks.details:
1. Install Playwright and Vitest in the project using npm or yarn. Ensure that the necessary dependencies for both frameworks are included in the package.json file. 
2. Create a directory structure for tests, including separate folders for unit tests and E2E tests. 
3. Configure Playwright to run E2E tests, including setting up browser contexts and test scenarios. 
4. Set up Vitest for unit testing, including configuration for test files and coverage reporting. 
5. Establish a CI/CD pipeline that runs tests automatically on each commit or pull request, using platforms like GitHub Actions or CircleCI. 
6. Define a policy that mandates all new features must have corresponding tests written before implementation, ensuring a TDD approach. 
7. Document the testing process and guidelines for writing tests to maintain consistency across the team.
tasks.testStrategy:
1. Verify that Playwright and Vitest are installed correctly by running initial test commands. 
2. Create sample tests for both frameworks and ensure they execute without errors. 
3. Check that the CI/CD pipeline triggers tests on code changes and that results are reported accurately. 
4. Review the documentation for the testing process to ensure it is clear and comprehensive for team members. 
5. Ensure that new feature branches are unable to merge without passing tests, validating the TDD policy implementation.

subtasks.title: Install Playwright and Vitest
subtasks.description: Install Playwright and Vitest in the project using npm or yarn.
subtasks.details: Ensure that the necessary dependencies for both frameworks are included in the package.json file.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify that Playwright and Vitest are installed correctly by running initial test commands.

subtasks.title: Create Test Directory Structure
subtasks.description: Create a directory structure for tests, including separate folders for unit tests and E2E tests.
subtasks.details: Organize the test files to maintain clarity and separation between unit and E2E tests.
subtasks.testStrategy: Check that the directory structure is correctly set up and accessible.

subtasks.title: Configure Playwright for E2E Tests
subtasks.description: Configure Playwright to run E2E tests, including setting up browser contexts and test scenarios.
subtasks.details: Set up necessary configurations for Playwright to execute end-to-end tests effectively.
subtasks.testStrategy: Run sample E2E tests to ensure Playwright is configured correctly.

subtasks.title: Set Up Vitest for Unit Testing
subtasks.description: Set up Vitest for unit testing, including configuration for test files and coverage reporting.
subtasks.details: Ensure that Vitest is configured to recognize test files and generate coverage reports.
subtasks.testStrategy: Create sample unit tests and check if they run successfully with coverage reporting.

subtasks.title: Establish CI/CD Pipeline
subtasks.description: Establish a CI/CD pipeline that runs tests automatically on each commit or pull request.
subtasks.details: Use platforms like GitHub Actions or CircleCI to automate the testing process.
subtasks.testStrategy: Check that the CI/CD pipeline triggers tests on code changes and that results are reported accurately.

subtasks.title: Define TDD Policy
subtasks.description: Define a policy that mandates all new features must have corresponding tests written before implementation.
subtasks.details: Ensure that the team adheres to a Test-Driven Development approach for new features.
subtasks.testStrategy: Review new feature implementations to ensure compliance with the TDD policy.

subtasks.title: Document Testing Process
subtasks.description: Document the testing process and guidelines for writing tests to maintain consistency across the team.
subtasks.details: Create comprehensive documentation that outlines testing procedures and best practices.
subtasks.testStrategy: Review documentation for clarity and completeness.

subtasks.title: Create Sample Tests
subtasks.description: Create sample tests for both frameworks and ensure they execute without errors.
subtasks.details: Develop basic test cases to validate the setup of Playwright and Vitest.
subtasks.testStrategy: Run the sample tests to confirm that both frameworks are functioning as expected.
